thread.section_title: Groupon Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Groupon | www.groupon.com | 9 of 260
thread.title: George

author: George
title: George
text: It FU my Computer so bad that it is still acting strange, I lost three days of my Diary, cant' find anywhere, the monitor now just goes black at random times all day. It changed my settings. Also it burned out my 250 gig SSD, now I have a $100.00, 3 Tera "WD" HD that I don't dare to use again.. It took me two days to just get my computer working somewhat.. I will NEVER trust "groupon" again. Well, live & learn, (Expensive). DON"T buy JUNK.
